title: Mecha Fizz

embed.description: Took so long to draw on Photoshop. I've only used the default brush sets. This 'character' belongs to Riot Games and League of Legends Mecha Fizz

body:
Hi guys.

Yesterday I decided to do a Mecha Fizz skin concept, so i did.
Even though im not good at using Photoshop, and especially drawing with a mouse-pad, i Tried my best.

I know, the environment is pretty crap, but I don't think i could do any better so yeah. 

Hopefully you like it and Enjoy.

Thanks {{champion:105}} {{summoner:31}}

replies.body: Oooh! This is really neat! It looks to me like a really cool hybrid between mecha and PROJECT. ^-^

if you can get another Fizz skin in the works I will love you forever â™¥

Well this was basically it 
I know the environment is crap xD
but here you go (i can give u one without the environment if u like
I think the skin is okay... But I really like the art! (At least for Fizz and the shark XD)
